thread.title: Lauren Conrad Finally Debuts Her Baby Bump!
thread.title_full: Lauren Conrad Finally Debuts Her Baby Bump!

author: Perez Hilton
title: Lauren Conrad Finally Debuts Her Baby Bump!
text:
So Savage! Khloé Kardashian Admits Kim Kardashian's Breakups Used To Make Her Feel Better -- Watch The Revenge Body Realness! 
Wow... Khloé Kardashian just got super real!! 
In a new clip from Khlo's fitness reality show Revenge Body , she got really candid on her past self-esteem issues and how Kim Kardashian West 's breakups would make her feel "GOOD" about herself when she was younger. Plug your ears, Kimmy! 
As we previously reported, Koko has been open with her weight issues over the years -- but this is the first time she has laid out her insecurities and jealousy so explicitly. 
While talking with Revenge Body contestant Will , she revealed how Kim's many relationships and "beautiful" looks would make her feel especially self-conscious. Subsequently, the reality star would feel relieved when those romances ended. 
The fitness guru admitted:
